Class HookableSaxHandler.ContentCapturingHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.inl.blacklab.index.HookableSaxHandler.ElementHandler

  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DocIndexerXmlHandlers.MetadataAttributesHandler, DocIndexerXmlHandlers.MetadataElementHandler, DocIndexerXmlHandlers.MetadataNameValueAttributeHandler
    Enclosing class:
    HookableSaxHandler

    public static class HookableSaxHandler.ContentCapturingHandler
extends HookableSaxHandler.ElementHandler
    A SAX parser hook handler that captures the element's character content for processing in the endElement() method.
